name: Daniel Juncadella
introduction: Daniel Juncadella Prez-Sala (born 7 May, 1991 in Barcelona, Province of Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain) is a Spanish racing driver who currently a test driver for ForceIndia. He was the final F3 Euro Series champion in 2012 before the series was discontinued and made his Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters debut in 2013. He has also taken part in the GP3 Series.
